verses.roman:
madhyāhna karite vipra prabhure kahilā
rūpa-gosāñi se-divasa tathāñi rahilā

synonyms: madhyāhna karite—to accept lunch; vipra—the brāhmaṇa of Deccan; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahilā—requested; rūpa-gosāñi—Rūpa Gosvāmī; se-divasa—that day; tathāñi—there; rahilā—remained.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was then requested by the brāhmaṇa to accept His lunch. Rūpa Gosvāmī also remained there that day.
